dcterms:description: A large dataset containing text from the English Wikipedia, used for training word embeddings and evaluating natural language processing tasks.
dcterms:title: English Wikipedia dump from October 2017 (enwiki)

dcterms:creator: M. Baroni
A. Lenci
dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating semantic relations between words, focusing on the relationships and similarities in meaning.
dcterms:title: BLESS dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Pennington
R. Socher
C. Manning
dcterms:description: A set of tasks designed to evaluate the ability of word embeddings to capture analogies between words.
dcterms:title: Word analogy tasks

dcterms:creator: O. Levy
Y. Goldberg
I. Dagan
dcterms:description: A collection of datasets used for evaluating word similarity and relatedness, providing human-annotated similarity scores.
dcterms:title: Word similarity datasets (WSsim, WSrel, MEN, MTurk, RW, SimLex)
